David Cage talks about Detroit: Become Human, a game he developed with Quantic Dream. He mentions their long-lasting relationship with Sony as a publisher, starting 10 years ago in 2006 with a demo called "The Casting," which later became Heavy Rain. Cage values the creative freedom and support provided by Sony, allowing them to experiment and try new things, even if not all attempts are successful.
